wordGroup: radio astronomy n. 射电天文学
physics and astronomy 物理学和天文学
national radio astronomy observatory 国立射电天文台

sentences.en: We are on the threshold of a new era in astronomy.
sentences.cn: 我们将迈入天文学的新时代。

sentences.en: The discovery is being hailed as the Holy Grail of astronomy.
sentences.cn: 这个发现被认为是为天文学圆了梦。

sentences.en: Scientists are trying to pull together disparate ideas in astronomy.
sentences.cn: 科学家正试图把天文学界各种迥然不同的观点汇集起来。
